channel.title: Monsterhearts 2: Ferret Ball
channel.description:
Monsterhearts 2: Ferret Ball
Hey everybinary, it's Monsterhearts time in June! To celebrate Pride Month I am running a scenario of Jason Cordova's True Beauty which can be found in Codex Joy 2. I will be running this game as set in 1985 New York.
Everything you need to play and beyond will be offered. Please note this is not a normal game of monsterhearts. We will be touching on how even in the LGBTQ+ community we may not be as understanding or accepting as we should. Just through an urban fantasy lens.
Games are set for Wednesdays in June at 7:30 pm CDT!
Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LcRwBO8BP0TldDCxWBB Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LcRwa6rGSZD1UMjDHwL Session 3: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LcRwnXJm2zyavya9tr8 Session 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LcRx-1BGcnTxrvz7te_
